import React from "react"; import api from "../utils/Api"; function Main(props) { const [userData, setUserData] = React.useState({ userName: "", userDescription: "", userAvatar: "" }); React.useEffect(() => { setUserData({ userName: 1, userDescription: 2, userAvatar: 3, }); } ) console.log({ userData }); return (

{userName}

{userDescription}

) } export default Main
